By: Scott Willoughby January 22, 2009 Whiteboard Friday - The Microsite Mistake The author's views are entirely their own (excluding the unlikely event of hypnosis) and may not always reflect the views of Moz. This week we'll look at an all too common misconception: the idea that building out a microsite to target a particular keyword, and then using that site's strength to link to your primary site is a worthwhile strategy. In the video Rand discusses issues such as link pop, domain diversity, and strategy while looking at how and why microsites are frequently used ineffectively. SEOmoz Whiteboard Friday - The Microsite Mistake from Scott Willoughby on Vimeo.
